sourcesContent:
import "./menu.css"; import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { ContentContext } from "./ContentContext"; export default function Menu() { const { handleContentChange } = useContext(ContentContext); const handleClick = (e, content) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default anchor behavior handleContentChange(content); // Update the content }; return (
  • handleClick(e, 'About')} > About
  • handleClick(e, 'Projects')} > Projects
  • handleClick(e, 'Contact')} > Contact
  • handleClick(e, 'Achievements')} > Achievements
); }
